description: Try our easy to follow Antipasto Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Antipasto Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place olives, artichokes and semidried tomatoes in small serving bowls and nestle amongst the sliced meats on the platter.
